Upload a transcript (unofficial transcripts are fine) that confirms your status as an actively enrolled student in a degree-granting program. 
 Advertising Sales division is large and complex, but these are the general business areas. Ad sales at NBCU Advertising & Partnerships is a multifaceted operation that supports clients through various specialized teams. The Client Team builds and maintains relationships with advertisers, while Ad Strategy and Programmatic ensure targeted and data-driven ad placements. Global Planning and Agency Planning focus on media planning across regions and agencies. Digital Sales Operations handles the technical aspects of digital ad delivery, with Account Services providing client support. Creative Partnerships craft innovative ad content, and Sports Sales capitalizes on NBCU's extensive sports portfolio. Finally, Marketing and Brand Partnerships drive collaborative campaigns, while Data, Measurements, Insights analyze performance to optimize strategies.  Areas of placement may include, but are not limited to: Media planning & Business Operations: Social Media Partnership: The Social Partnerships Team builds and operates a portfolio of ad sales partnerships with leading and emerging digital platforms, including Meta, TikTok, YouTube, and more. That includes identifying profitable revenue opportunities, developing the structure, capabilities, go-to-market strategies, and execution plans necessary to capture growth opportunities and driving those plans to implementation and through ongoing operations. We are within the Ad Sales organization and a part of the greater Partnerships team. We partner closely with the sales teams and content teams to manage and drive rapid revenue growth. As well as visual and graphic design.Communications: From an external communications standpoint, you will support communications responsibilities, including executive communications, media relations and administrative support Commerce Partnerships: Commerce Partnerships is an emerging business within Josh Feldmans Marketing & Brand Partnerships organization. We are working to fulfill the long sought-after dream to - either with a click of a button or tap of a remote -instantly purchase the amazing products and services you see in tv shows, digital content, social platforms, virtual worlds, and more. Planning: The planning roles consist of the pre-sale support team (Strategic Planning, Platform Monetization) as well as the post-sale support team (Account Services).  The Strategic Planning team is one of the largest entities in Ad Sales and supports the Account Executives and Account Directors with pre-sale campaign planning, including pricing, inventory, ad placement, etc.  Digital Sports Pricing & Planning: The Digital Sports Pricing & Planning Intern provides support to the Sport Digital Pricing & Planning team. This role will aid the Pricing & Planning team in ensuring campaigns are properly managed, internal systems are reflecting accurate information and assisting our team in driving revenue to the organization. These projects will surround our  properties such as the NFL, NBA, Big Ten, Premier League and more! This includes assisting with building of media plans, order entry, Op1 modifications/optimizations, weekly deal stewardship, quality assurance checks, invoice reconciliation, ad-hoc reporting and assisting with inventory, process and guideline documentation. The CoE provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive internal effectiveness and new initiatives forward.  We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations and help evolve early-stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.
